data.message:
Plz tell me why facebook daily updated & i update facebook but not working some time correctly 
Not responding error show me my screen when i use facebook app....
Plz tell me...?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Aarib. Please report the problem you're experiencing  to us here: http://bit.ly/2qkphLi. -Jon
I am guessing you want credits for this inconvenience? Guess what, this is a free app!

Jipjip Sumastre Nothing is free! Don't be a fool. Facebook tracks every single activity on your smartphone, tracks your location when GPS is turned on and they sell all this data along with your name, images and many other details in your profile to third parties and earn billions of dollars.
